7. The Roswell UFO Incident

The alleged crash of an extraterrestrial spacecraft in Roswell, New Mexico, in

1947 has been subject to various conspiracy theories (Roswell Army Air Field

(RAAF), 2020). Proponents argue that the US military covered up evidence of

alien life and technology. However, experts have thoroughly debunked these
